meaning: A day or period of celebration.
examples: Diwali is a festival of lights.
The village hosts a harvest festival.

meaning: A large natural stream of water flowing in a channel.
examples: The river flows to the sea.
We crossed the river by boat.

meaning: The process of gathering crops.
examples: Farmers celebrate after the harvest.
The harvest season is busy.

meaning: A place where children go to learn.
examples: I go to school every day.
Our school has a big playground.

meaning: A person you like and enjoy spending time with.
examples: She is my best friend.
I play with my friends after school.

meaning: A small community in a rural area.
examples: My grandparents live in a village.
The village has clean air.

meaning: A place where people buy and sell things.
examples: We buy vegetables at the market.
The market is crowded on Sundays.

meaning: A person who teaches students.
examples: My teacher is very kind.
The teacher explains everything clearly.

meaning: Parents and their children living together.
examples: I love my family.
Our family goes on picnics together.

meaning: A piece of land where flowers and vegetables grow.
examples: We have a garden behind our house.
Beautiful flowers grow in the garden.

meaning: A very high hill.
examples: The mountain is covered with snow.
We climbed the mountain.

meaning: A large area covered with trees.
examples: Many animals live in the forest.
The forest is green and beautiful.

meaning: An animal with wings that can fly.
examples: I see a bird in the tree.
Birds sing in the morning.

meaning: The colorful part of a plant that blooms.
examples: The flower smells sweet.
Red flowers grow in our garden.

meaning: A tall plant with a wooden trunk and branches.
examples: The tree gives us shade.
We sit under the tree.

meaning: A written work with pages bound together.
examples: I read a book every day.
This book tells an interesting story.

meaning: A place where sick people get treatment.
examples: The doctor works in a hospital.
My sister was born in a hospital.

meaning: A person who treats sick people.
examples: The doctor gave me medicine.
I want to become a doctor.

meaning: A person who grows crops and raises animals.
examples: The farmer works in the field.
Farmers grow food for us.

meaning: Water that falls from clouds.
examples: The rain makes everything wet.
Plants need rain to grow.

meaning: The bright star that gives us light and heat.
examples: The sun rises in the morning.
The sun is very hot today.

meaning: The bright object in the night sky that orbits Earth.
examples: The moon shines at night.
I can see the full moon tonight.

meaning: A clear liquid that we drink.
examples: I drink water when I am thirsty.
Plants need water to grow.

meaning: Things we eat to stay alive and healthy.
examples: We eat food three times a day.
Healthy food makes us strong.

meaning: A building where people live.
examples: We live in a small house.
My house has three rooms.

meaning: A path for vehicles to travel on.
examples: The road is wide and clean.
We walk on the side of the road.

meaning: A vehicle with two wheels that you pedal.
examples: I ride my bicycle to school.
My father bought me a new bicycle.

meaning: A large vehicle that carries many passengers.
examples: We go to school by bus.
The bus stops at every village.

meaning: A vehicle that runs on railway tracks.
examples: The train runs very fast.
We traveled to Delhi by train.

meaning: The early part of the day.
examples: I wake up early in the morning.
Birds sing in the morning.

meaning: The time when it is dark outside.
examples: Stars shine at night.
I sleep at night.

meaning: A day when you don't go to school or work.
examples: Today is a holiday.
We enjoy our summer holidays.

meaning: A tale about people and events.
examples: Grandma tells us interesting stories.
I like to read stories.

meaning: An activity you play for fun.
examples: We play games after school.
Cricket is my favorite game.

meaning: Music with words that you sing.
examples: We sing songs in music class.
This is a beautiful song.

meaning: A living creature that can move.
examples: The zoo has many animals.
We should be kind to animals.

meaning: An animal that lives in water.
examples: Fish swim in the river.
We eat fish curry.

meaning: A colorful insect with large wings.
examples: The butterfly flies from flower to flower.
I saw a beautiful butterfly.

meaning: A white or gray mass in the sky.
examples: Dark clouds bring rain.
I see shapes in the clouds.

meaning: A bright point of light in the night sky.
examples: Stars twinkle at night.
I counted ten stars.

meaning: The planet we live on.
examples: Earth is our home.
We must protect the earth.

meaning: Moving air that you can feel.
examples: The wind blows the leaves.
A strong wind is blowing.

meaning: One of the four parts of the year.
examples: Summer is my favorite season.
Each season has its own beauty.

meaning: The property of objects that we see.
examples: Red is my favorite color.
The rainbow has seven colors.

meaning: An image or drawing of something.
examples: I drew a picture of my house.
This picture is very beautiful.

meaning: A written message sent to someone.
examples: I wrote a letter to my grandmother.
The postman delivered the letter.

meaning: An open area of land for farming or sports.
examples: The farmer works in the field.
We play cricket in the field.

meaning: A small area of water.
examples: Lotus flowers grow in the pond.
Ducks swim in the pond.

meaning: A structure built over a river or road.
examples: We crossed the river on a bridge.
The bridge is very long.

meaning: A place of worship.
examples: We visit the temple on festivals.
The temple is very old.
